message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your needs and enhance your experience. It comes with a variety of features that I believe will be of great value to you. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to propose a price of $200 for this product. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're adding to the product. However, based on my research and budget constraints, I am looking for a price closer to $150. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and I respect your budget constraints. I would like to make a counteroffer of $175 for the product. This price reflects the value I believe the product holds and also allows me to maintain a reasonable profit margin. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations and we can come to a satisfactory agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's features and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $160. I hope this aligns better with your cost considerations while staying within my budget.
